item.title: Commenly-used Script
item.description: Missing Value Unique Others When I have to use R, Python, SAS, SQL, and Bash at the same time in different projects, to make the transfer easier, I built a list of the commonly used script for reference. At the beginning, a data set with missing and duplicated values were simulated. This data set was also saved to the feather format, which can be consumed by Python, too.

item.title: Jiang Li
item.description: I am a data modeling analyst using R/Python/SAS, a Ph.D. in physics, an enthusiastic volunteer teaching math, and a proud dad of three amazing kids. Email: jiangliemail at gmail dot com Twitter: @Jiang_Li1 LinkedIn
